data.title: Eilidh McKellar – Female Session Guitarist
data.meta_description: Hi, My name's Eilidh McKellar, I am a 21 year old session guitarist currently living in London. I graduated from Leeds College of Music this year with a 1st Class Honours in Popular Music, G...
data.text:
Hi,

My name’s Eilidh McKellar, I am a 21 year old session guitarist currently living in London. I graduated from Leeds College of Music this year with a 1st Class Honours in Popular Music, Guitar performance. I am a versatile guitarist, can adapt to any music and play tastefully.

I am endorsed by Paul Reed Smith guitars and Ernie Ball.

I have experience playing with different artists and played in function bands. Looking for any good session work.

I am also a singer-songwriter, so can sing backing vocals. As an artist I am currently managed by the Grammy winning producer Guy Eckstine at Iconique Music Group.

I recorded my debut album last year in Los Angeles, produced by Guy Eckstine (Herbie Hancock, Chris Botti). Top session musicians played on my album; Tim Lefebvre on bass (Saturday Night Live, Late Night with David Letterman, Tedeschi Trucks Band, Jamie Cullum); Alan Okuye on keys (Ricky Lee Jones, Bobby Womack) and Guy Eckstine on drums (Herbie Hancock, Miles Davis).

I have performed with the American blues guitarist Joe Bonamassa several times at the Hamersmith Apollo (with Bernie Marsden from Whitesnake), Glasgow Royal Concert Hall and Manchester Arena.

I have performed with established musicians including Carmine Rojas (David Bowie, Rod Stewart, Tina Turner, Stevie Wonder), Tal Bergman (Rod Stewart, Billy Idol, Chaka Khan), Derek Sherinian (Alice Cooper, Kiss, Dream Theater).

YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/user/eilidhmckellar
